projects.title: Flight Path Generator App
projects.description: A shortest path generator for small planes using C# and Windows Forms
projects.overview: The Flight Path Generator App is a Windows Forms application written in C# that helps small aircraft pilots and planners determine the shortest and most efficient flight paths between airports. The app uses distance between coordinates to calculate optimal routes, taking into account various constraints and user inputs.
overview_points: Built with C# and Windows Forms
Created for my A-Level Computer Science NEA
User-friendly interface for entering airports and waypoints
Visualizes the calculated flight path on a map
key_features: Interactive user input for selecting start and end points, fuel quantity and plane size

projects.title: Itinerary Planner App
projects.description: A Itinerary manager for a company who plans and sets activities using Java
projects.overview: This project was built for my Object Oriented Programming module in the first year of University, it takes into account the user of objects for the itinerary and the activities and uses classes to perform calculations, saving details to text files and the graphical interface of the application.
overview_points: Implements Swing (A graphical user interface library)
User-friendly interface for reading itinerary data
key_features: Performs numerical calculations on currency values
Exports itinerary data to text files to store data
A command line interface for entering new activities and itinerary's

projects.title: SQL Portfolio
projects.description: A full document showing proof of knowledge on SQL queries in SQL Server
projects.overview: This document shows proof of understanding of SQL Server, it shows my understanding of using queries on a 'superhero' database example given to me by University
overview_points: Contains SQL queries for selecting and manipulating data from a database
Provides explanations of each query used and what they are for
Created as a guide for developers wanting to use the database in their applications

projects.title: N8N Workflows
projects.overview: N8N is an open source AI workflow automation tool that I host on my debian linux server. It allows me to create the following demonstrations that remove manual tasks I have to do in day to day life
overview_points: Github tracker that tracks when I or another use pushes to my git account, records details of the push and posts it to a discord channel

RSS Tracker that tracks https://krebsonsecurity.com/ & https://thehackernews.com/ for new articles, it gives a brief overview of the article and stores it in a google sheet after sending it to discord
